justification: "Lab studies allow measures such as miss errors to be observed, which are difficult to determine in a clinical setting … We can use this measure … to investigate the effects of transparency on decision making with CAD."
"We can use this measure, along with False Alarms and other breast screening metrics … to investigate the effects of transparency on decision making with CAD."
"To understand the reason for any differences in error rates … we examined how Sensitivity (as measured by d') … changed across CAD Systems using Signal Detection Theory (SDT)."
"To understand the reason for any differences in error rates … we examined how … Response Bias (measured by c) changed across CAD Systems using Signal Detection Theory (SDT)."
